colors.title: Colors
colors.description: MoinUI provides a set of colors for quick UI development.
colors.palette_desc: The base color palette totals 120 colors, including 12 primary colors and their derivative colors. Each primary generates 10 gradient levels (1-10). Level 6 is the primary, with dual shorthand (e.g. .blue6 / .blue).
colors.generator_desc: Select a primary color to generate a complete 10-level palette.
colors.usage_desc: MoinUI provides multiple ways to use colors.
colors.semantic_usage_desc: Use built-in semantic colors (primary/success/warning/danger) that adapt to themes.
colors.palette_usage_desc: Use different palette levels (1-10) for color variants.
colors.generate_usage_desc: Generate a complete 10-level palette from any color.

code.semantic: Semantic colors - auto adapt to theme

api.generate: Generate palette from primary color, supports light/dark theme
